citations.narrative:
Facility has more animals than what the license was issued for. In discussion, it appears that at the time of applying the
licensee thought the total animals listed on box 11 of 7003A would be total adult animals maintained. There are fewer
than 200 adults at the facility as were their intentions, however with offspring on hand counted there are 214 total animals
at the facility. Licenses authorize increments of 50 animals on hand at any single point in time during the period of
licensure and current license authorizes 200 animals total. Facility will need to ensure authorized maximum numbers are
not exceeded; this can be done by re-applying for a increased maximum total or by breeding fewer animals (change
amount of paired breeders to have less offspring).
Correct by April 9, 2026.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.1(b)(2)(i) 
   
Requirements and application 
Facility has more animals than what the license was issued for. In discussion, it appears that at the time of applying the 
licensee thought the total animals listed on box 11 of 7003A would be total adult animals maintained. There are fewer 
than 200 adults at the facility as were their intentions, however with offspring on hand counted there are 214 total animals 
at the facility. Licenses authorize increments of 50 animals on hand at any single point in time during the period of 
licensure and current license authorizes 200 animals total. Facility will need to ensure authorized maximum numbers are 
not exceeded; this can be done by re-applying for a increased maximum total or by breeding fewer animals (change 
amount of paired breeders to have less offspring).  
Correct by April 9, 2026. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
